@hannahb_crafts reinsert the end of wire through a stitch 1 or 2 away from where it just came out of at the left armpit and bring it out somewhere in the back to create an anchor reinsert the wire again 1 or 2 stitches away and bring it out anywhere else shown to the left now you can cut the end of the wire as close as possible to the body this little piece of wire in the back will be hidden by the fur you have now completed your posable arms you should have a legless body like in the image no w you need to repeat this process with the legs in exactly the same way the legs will be placed between row 7 and 8 of the body now you have a complete orangutan body the next step is adding beige palms with magnets inside this is an optional step so skip it if you like © 2021 hb crafts all rights reserved this pattern is for personal use only 17 hannah bickerstaff - @hannahb_crafts palms make 4 use 2 5mm hook and beige yarn round sts 1 chain 6 turn 5 2-7 single_crochet 5 chain 1 turn
